title: REM Eyewear Updates Online Presence With New Site
text:
By CLICK Staff  10 PM 
REM Eyewear has launched REMEyewear.com2.0 , a completely updated new online presence for the eyewear company. The new site, featuring a “responsive design” which is optimized with dynamic pages, is easily viewed on all devices, including smartphones and tablets as well as desktop display and it features all new brand images, an enhanced navigation, a new search functionality and more. 
The company notes, “Due to the growth of REM Eyewear’s business, as well as the evolution of the eyewear industry and purchasing capabilities, REM saw it appropriate to reinvent REMEyewear.com. The redesigned site targets both ECPs and consumers. The site features a new retailer locator. 
REM’s portfolio of brands are also highlighted and depicted in new ways on the site, including each brand’s story, plus a full display and images of the collections. REM’s portfolio includes Converse, John Varvatos, Tumi, Jonathan Adler, Lucky Brand, Jones New York, Rembrand and Spine. MORE ON: CLICK
